rules_text:
Activate an ability of The Dewfather only once each turn as a sorcery while The Dewfather is in exile.
Remove a time counter from The Dewfather: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Remove a time counter from The Dewfather: Create a 2/2 bear creature token.
Remove five time counters from The Dewfather: Shuffle target suspended card from exile into its owner’s library.
Suspend 9–{1}{G}
notes: Edit heavily, but core concept is good.
